name: CARNAL 2 - PROTOTYPES
description:
This is a collection of prototypes I made from January till July 2022, trying different rendering styles and technologies. Included in the zip file are four of these builds. These are not fully fucntional games, more vertical slices of what I thought the games could end up being.

Like there is no sound design, you can't die in-game and most of them perform not great, especially the next-gen prototype.

If anything this just shows how clueless I am in regards to making games.

Maybe someone will like trying them out, who knows! Feel free to comment lol.
